author: Yun Li
title: Goldman lists stocks for if the worst is over, and stocks for if it's not
description: Goldman Sachs is advising clients to focus on two buckets of stocks in the short term amid the coronavirus crisis.
content:
(This story is for CNBC Pro subscribers only.)
The stock market rebounded sharply this week amid rising optimism that the coronavirus pandemic is improving. Still, many investors are skeptical the worst of the outbreak is behind us and the economic recovery … [+264 chars]
